使用方法

usage method
If there is no marking, turn off the training node for marking first. After marking, set the relevant settings for the training node, turn off the marking node, and start training
F:\动画素材库\al角色\训练素材\现代男女\nv\10_nv

对于多分辨率训练，输入具有不同数据集分辨率的相同源目录，Flux喜欢多种分辨率。
对于单分辨率训练，只需添加单个数据集。
